subject: Basketball
Race and Ethnicity
Boycotts
Discrimination
Blacks
lead_paragraph: The Clippers players turned their jerseys inside out during a practice. You wonder, in years to come, if these proud men and splendid athletes will think that was enough of a response.
snippet: The Clippers players turned their jerseys inside out during a practice. You wonder, in years to come, if these proud men and splendid athletes will think that was enough of a response.
